text: Edgar Meyer is an American Grammy Award-winning double bassist. Over the years, he has worked with classical and bluegrass artists such as Joshua Bell, Yo-Yo Ma, BÃ©la Fleck, Sam Bush, James Taylor, Jerry Douglas, Mike Marshall, Mark O'Connor, Alison Krauss, the members of Nickel Creek, and Mary Chapin Carpenter. == Other websites == *Official website Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Tennessee Category:American classical musicians Category:Bluegrass musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Classical double bassists
